text: Timothy Francis Robbins (born October 16, 1958) is an American actor, screenwriter, director, producer, activist, and amateur musician. He has won many awards in his career, including the Academy Award in 2004 for his work in Mystic River. He was born in West Covina, Los Angeles County and raised in New York City. He was the partner of actress Susan Sarandon from 1988 to 2009. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 1984 Toy Soldiers Boe No Small Affair Nelson 1985 Fraternity Vacation Larry "Mother" Tucker The Sure Thing Gary Cooper 1986 Howard the Duck Phil Blumburtt Nominated — Razzie Award for Worst Supporting Actor Top Gun Lt.
